short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brings you interesting facts, wallpapers, clock and more, when you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search the web and learn new facts.

Cool Facts Chrome Extension presents facts and enrich your knowledge every time you open a new tab to search the web. 

You will also enjoy beautiful background images that will spark your imagination and also clock. Moreover, easy access to your most visited links, bookmarks, Google Apps, downloads & recently closed tabs.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Cool Facts Chrome extension and setting Chrome™️ New Tab to that provided by the service with search results by Microsoft Bing, and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Install now and start to learn new facts.

Free facts content is distributed by The Fact Site - https://www.thefactsite.com
Free stock media content is distributed by Unsplash - https://unsplash.com
Privacy Policy: https://www.facts-tab.com/privacy-policy.html
Terms of Use: https://www.facts-tab.com/terms.html
